channel.title: Project RuneLord - thanks guys! go away flamers!
channel.description:
Before starting i would like to thank all those people who viewed RuneLord, =D! [b][size=14pt]Please rate and comment, hope you like it. I know delta client sucks, but those are the old pictures i had about 2 months ago. new pics coming soon![/size][/b]
[b][size=14pt]we need beta testers, add me xxlove2pkxx@Hotmail.com you are welcome to be one![size][/b] [b][size=5pt]Also:[size][/b] Modeler. Client editor. Coder, extra help..
Apply form: How long have you been doing what you do: Msn: Coded on other servers before: Age:
RuneLord! Staff: Mark - Owner(me) Mod Mike Lots of staff quit..
We need Beta Testers and Staff! To become a beta tester or a Staff, Just reply a comment.
Fixes: 100% Barrows 100% Boxing Gloves and Boxing Ring [s]95% Fixed Camp[/s] Canceled Due to glitches and lagg results 100% Battlefield [i]100% RuneScape logos, website 2005 gameframe jingle sound while loading game music, badass music options(Change the song) Credits to wolfgoal *THANKS BUDDY*[/i] 100% Minigames. 100% GS Stance 100% Dieng and HP glitch *fixed*!
[b]Server Teleports:[/b] [s]1 Teleport[/s] [s]5 teleports[/s] [s]8 Teleports[/s] [s]11 Teleports[/s] [s]18 Teleports[/s]
[b]Pictures:[/b] Updating to new pictures :D , UPDATE BIG TIME! [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Barrows.jpg[/img] Home: [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Home.jpg[/img] Battlefield, AWSOME WAR FIELD TRY IT OUT 75K PER PLAYER KILL: [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/battlefield-2.jpg[/img] Train on penguins: [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Train-1.jpg[/img] Party Room 100% per week drop party! [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Party.jpg[/img] Bounty Hunter? Epic.. *GIVE SOME CREDITS TO THE GUY WHO MADE A TUT ON HOW TO MAKE THE BOUNTY HUNTER *ONLY COPIED A SMALL PART OF IT, REST BY ME* Plus the random target is fixed :D [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Bounty.jpg[/img] Custom item - whip of forgivness: [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/WhipofForgivness.jpg[/img] Custom item2 - blades of chaos: [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/GhostBlades.jpg[/img] Custom Items - specials: [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Customs.jpg[/img] Nazi Zombies: [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Zombies.jpg[/img] Gs Stance: [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/gsstance-1.jpg[/img] 100% Guide: [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Tour-1.jpg[/img] Login Screen: [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Loginscreen.jpg[/img] Quick Chat! [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Quickchat.jpg[/img] Kbd and Funkill, took some guys suggestion! [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Funpkandkbd.jpg[/img] Some skills to get money... [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Skills.jpg[/img]
[i]Also over 7 new custom quests created, hidden minigames and stories![/i]
What an idiot I am for forgetting the awsome people who helped me throughout my career!: Mod Mike *Coding* Zaidfire*Quests, Ideas, Glitches Fixed*. Mark(Me):*Coding Everything and making custom quests fixing login handlers and glitches*. Moparscapers who helped: Sorry forgot name, but he made a bounty hunter tutorial. Wolfs goal - sounds and music frame tutorial * BIG THANKS REP IF I COULD =/* You guys - helping me out, support, Thank you moparscape!! *NOTE: That doesn't Include cows1471 and idiots who have gave me bad support and bad compliments about the server.
[b]UPDATE: This has been posted a month ago, it has huge changes, new quests and more![/b] Update: Beta Trailer Link: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mRAjdc_nMSw]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mRAjdc_nMSw[/url] This video has only a FEW places on runelord, yet it still is a good video, i hope you like it.

item.title: Project RuneLord - thanks guys! go away flamers!
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

[quote=“i0wn3v3ry, post:49, topic:333427”]I like a lot of it, such as the “Forgiveness whip”, but I don’t like some of the other customs, and I don’t like the bounty hunter.

Which I think Mod Dcrew or something, made that.[/quote]
Ohnestly, i dont really like the bounty too, i think its useless, thats why im removing it, cant think of any
custom minigame i can make…

Read full topic

item.title: Project RuneLord - thanks guys! go away flamers!
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:42, topic:333427”][quote author=123kdd100 link=topic=429834.msg3305559#msg3305559 date=1281641807]

Thanks Guys for your comments best replies atm

Ur all queer. It’s delta - no more needs to be said

whats wrong with you people… Prejudice Kids these days…
Delta will not be my base… I’m currently making my OWN Base called ‘RuneLord’ if you can read, and whats wrong with delta…

I doubt your writing or wrote your own base. You should know what is wrong with delta, don’t even try to get away with the “oh I don’t know I haven’t seen what is wrong with delta”.

This is delta with some changes, I doubt you have 100% drop party the picture you have shows no way at all that you even added the drop party stuff.

I should also add in most of what you listed was already in delta, or you just used a tutorial to add it.

First of all, if you can read, it says im working on the client cause it freezes most of the time.
second of all, its nto completeley done, im just releasing on moparscape for a while and ill update it too.
well, thanks for commenting anyway asshole.
[/quote]

First of all you didn’t say anything about about your client freezing in this quote nor in your topic I don’t see were your getting that from. Secondly like I said I doubt you wrote your Own base, the way you replied shows that you haven’t even started since your getting so defensive. If you do release your own base then you’ve proven me wrong but I doubt it still.[/quote]
Umm, thats cause these pics are old -.-
i had them on my pc for like 3 months
btw i aint going to waste my life with such a flamer like you.

Read full topic

and now we don’t use the site anymore, now all you need to check is www.runelord.smfforfree.com and forget about the site i wrote about, and btw Mark(the coder of runelord and 123kdd200) is outside the country, which means runelord cannot be runned until he returns which will be in about 1-2 months, i know all of you have been waiting for so long but there’s nothing i can do, srry
